name: dfdf

html:
{{ doc.organization }}

Resource Consents

{{ frappe.utils.formatdate(frappe.utils.nowdate(), "dd MMMM yyyy") }}

{% if doc.applicant_type == "Individual" and doc.applicant_individual %} {% set applicant = frappe.get_doc("Individual", doc.applicant_individual) %} {{ applicant.first_name }} {{ applicant.last_name }}
{% if applicant.email %}{{ applicant.email }}
{% endif %} {% elif doc.applicant_type == "Organization" and doc.applicant_organization %} {% set applicant = frappe.get_doc("Organization", doc.applicant_organization) %} {{ applicant.organization_name }}
{% if applicant.email %}{{ applicant.email }}
{% endif %} {% endif %}

RE: Resource Consent Application {{ doc.name }}
Property: {% if doc.property %} {% set property = frappe.get_doc("Property", doc.property) %} {{ property.property_address }} {% endif %}

Dear {% if doc.applicant_type == "Individual" and doc.applicant_individual %} {% set applicant = frappe.get_doc("Individual", doc.applicant_individual) %} {{ applicant.first_name }} {{ applicant.last_name }} {% elif doc.applicant_type == "Organization" and doc.applicant_organization %} {% set applicant = frappe.get_doc("Organization", doc.applicant_organization) %} {{ applicant.organization_name }} {% endif %} ,

Thank you for your resource consent application received on {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.lodgement_date, "dd MMMM yyyy") }}.

Application Details:

  • Application Number: {{ doc.name }}
  • Property Address: {% if doc.property %} {% set property = frappe.get_doc("Property", doc.property) %} {{ property.property_address }} {% endif %}
  • Legal Description: {% if doc.property %} {% set property = frappe.get_doc("Property", doc.property) %} {{ property.legal_description }} {% endif %}
  • Proposal: {{ doc.application_description }}
  • Activity Status: {{ doc.activity_status }}

Your application is currently being processed. We will contact you if we require any further information under section 92 of the Resource Management Act 1991.

What happens next?

  1. We will review your application for completeness
  2. We will determine notification requirements under sections 95-95E of the RMA
  3. We may request further information if required
  4. If your application is notified, we will advise you of the submission period
  5. Once processing is complete, we will issue a decision

If you have any questions about your application, please contact us quoting your application number {{ doc.name }}.

Yours sincerely,

Consents Team

Resource Consents Team
name: Application Acknowledgment Letter

html:
{{ doc.organization }}

Resource Consents

{{ frappe.utils.formatdate(frappe.utils.nowdate(), "dd MMMM yyyy") }}

{% if doc.applicant_type == "Individual" and doc.applicant_individual %} {% set applicant = frappe.get_doc("Individual", doc.applicant_individual) %} {{ applicant.first_name }} {{ applicant.last_name }}
{% if applicant.email %}{{ applicant.email }}
{% endif %} {% elif doc.applicant_type == "Organization" and doc.applicant_organization %} {% set applicant = frappe.get_doc("Organization", doc.applicant_organization) %} {{ applicant.organization_name }}
{% if applicant.email %}{{ applicant.email }}
{% endif %} {% endif %}

RE: Request for Further Information
Application: {{ doc.name }}
Property: {% if doc.property %} {% set property = frappe.get_doc("Property", doc.property) %} {{ property.property_address }} {% endif %}

Dear {% if doc.applicant_type == "Individual" and doc.applicant_individual %} {% set applicant = frappe.get_doc("Individual", doc.applicant_individual) %} {{ applicant.first_name }} {{ applicant.last_name }} {% elif doc.applicant_type == "Organization" and doc.applicant_organization %} {% set applicant = frappe.get_doc("Organization", doc.applicant_organization) %} {{ applicant.organization_name }} {% endif %} ,

We are writing to request further information in relation to your resource consent application under section 92 of the Resource Management Act 1991.

Information Required:

{% if doc.s92_information_required %}
{{ doc.s92_information_required }}
{% else %}

[Please specify the information required]

{% endif %}

Timeframe for Response:

{% if doc.s92_due_date %}

Please provide the requested information by {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.s92_due_date, "dd MMMM yyyy") }}.

{% else %}

Please provide the requested information within 20 working days from the date of this letter.

{% endif %}

Important Notes:

  • The statutory timeframe for processing your application is suspended from the date of this request until we receive the information
  • If the information is not received within the specified timeframe, we may return your application under section 91 of the RMA
  • Please reference your application number ({{ doc.name }}) when providing the information

If you have any questions about this request, please contact us quoting {{ doc.name }}.

Yours sincerely,

{% if doc.case_officer %} {{ doc.case_officer }}
{% endif %} Consents Team

Resource Consents Team
name: Section 92 Information Request

html:
{{ frappe.get_value("Resource Consent Application", doc.resource_consent_application, "organization") }}

Resource Consent Decision

{{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.approved_date, "dd MMMM yyyy") if doc.approved_date else frappe.utils.formatdate(frappe.utils.nowdate(), "dd MMMM yyyy") }}

{% set rca = frappe.get_doc("Resource Consent Application", doc.resource_consent_application) %}

{% if rca.applicant_type == "Individual" and rca.applicant_individual %} {% set applicant = frappe.get_doc("Individual", rca.applicant_individual) %} {{ applicant.first_name }} {{ applicant.last_name }}
{% if applicant.email %}{{ applicant.email }}
{% endif %} {% elif rca.applicant_type == "Organization" and rca.applicant_organization %} {% set applicant = frappe.get_doc("Organization", rca.applicant_organization) %} {{ applicant.organization_name }}
{% if applicant.email %}{{ applicant.email }}
{% endif %} {% endif %}

DECISION ON RESOURCE CONSENT APPLICATION

Application Number: {{ rca.name }}
Property: {% if rca.property %} {% set property = frappe.get_doc("Property", rca.property) %} {{ property.property_address }}
Legal Description: {{ property.legal_description }} {% endif %}

DECISION

Pursuant to sections 104, 104B, 104C, and 108 of the Resource Management Act 1991, {{ rca.organization }} GRANTS resource consent for:

{{ rca.application_description }}

{% if rca.property %} {% set property = frappe.get_doc("Property", rca.property) %}

at {{ property.property_address }}, subject to the conditions set out below.

{% endif %}

CONSENT DETAILS

{% if doc.consent_duration_years %} {% endif %} {% if doc.consent_expiry_date %} {% endif %} {% if doc.lapsing_date %} {% endif %}
Consent Type: {{ rca.consent_type }}
Activity Status: {{ rca.activity_status }}
Duration: {{ doc.consent_duration_years }} years
Expiry Date: {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.consent_expiry_date, "dd MMMM yyyy") }}
Lapsing Date: {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.lapsing_date, "dd MMMM yyyy") }} (if not given effect to)
{% if doc.decision_summary %}

SUMMARY OF DECISION

{{ doc.decision_summary }}
{% endif %}

CONDITIONS OF CONSENT

This consent is granted subject to the following conditions:

{% for condition in doc.consent_conditions %}

Condition {{ condition.condition_number }}: {{ condition.condition_category }}

{{ condition.condition_text }}

{% if condition.justification %}

Justification (s108AA RMA): {{ condition.justification }}

{% endif %}
{% endfor %} {% if doc.advice_notes %}

ADVICE NOTES

The following advice notes are provided for information (these are not conditions of consent):

{% for note in doc.advice_notes %}

{{ loop.index }}. {{ note.advice_text }}

{% endfor %} {% endif %} {% if doc.reasons_for_decision %}

REASONS FOR DECISION

{{ doc.reasons_for_decision }}
{% endif %}

WHEN THIS CONSENT TAKES LEGAL EFFECT

This decision takes legal effect on {% if doc.legal_effect_date %}{{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.legal_effect_date, "dd MMMM yyyy") }}{% else %}[Date to be confirmed]{% endif %}, unless:

  • An objection is lodged under section 357A of the RMA by {% if doc.objection_period_end %}{{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.objection_period_end, "dd MMMM yyyy") }}{% else %}[15 working days from service]{% endif %}; or
  • An appeal is lodged under section 120 of the RMA by {% if doc.objection_period_end %}{{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.objection_period_end, "dd MMMM yyyy") }}{% else %}[15 working days from notification]{% endif %}

RIGHT TO OBJECT OR APPEAL

Objections (s357A RMA): You have the right to object to specific conditions of this consent within 15 working days of receiving this decision.

Appeals (s120 RMA): Submitters and the applicant have the right to appeal this decision to the Environment Court within 15 working days of notification.

For more information on objections and appeals, please contact us or visit the Ministry for the Environment website.

If you have any questions about this decision or the conditions of consent, please contact us quoting {{ rca.name }}.

Yours sincerely,

{% if doc.approved_by %} {{ doc.approved_by }}
{% endif %} Consent Authority

Resource Consent Decision issued under the Resource Management Act 1991
name: Decision Letter - Granted with Conditions

html:
{{ frappe.get_value("Resource Consent Application", doc.resource_consent_application, "organization") }}

Resource Consent Decision

{{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.approved_date, "dd MMMM yyyy") if doc.approved_date else frappe.utils.formatdate(frappe.utils.nowdate(), "dd MMMM yyyy") }}

{% set rca = frappe.get_doc("Resource Consent Application", doc.resource_consent_application) %}

{% if rca.applicant_type == "Individual" and rca.applicant_individual %} {% set applicant = frappe.get_doc("Individual", rca.applicant_individual) %} {{ applicant.first_name }} {{ applicant.last_name }}
{% if applicant.email %}{{ applicant.email }}
{% endif %} {% elif rca.applicant_type == "Organization" and rca.applicant_organization %} {% set applicant = frappe.get_doc("Organization", rca.applicant_organization) %} {{ applicant.organization_name }}
{% if applicant.email %}{{ applicant.email }}
{% endif %} {% endif %}

DECISION ON RESOURCE CONSENT APPLICATION

Application Number: {{ rca.name }}
Property: {% if rca.property %} {% set property = frappe.get_doc("Property", rca.property) %} {{ property.property_address }}
Legal Description: {{ property.legal_description }} {% endif %}

DECISION

Pursuant to sections 104, 104B, 104C, and 104D of the Resource Management Act 1991, {{ rca.organization }} DECLINES resource consent for:

{{ rca.application_description }}

{% if rca.property %} {% set property = frappe.get_doc("Property", rca.property) %}

at {{ property.property_address }}.

{% endif %} {% if doc.decision_summary %}

SUMMARY OF DECISION

{{ doc.decision_summary }}
{% endif %} {% if doc.reasons_for_decision %}

REASONS FOR DECLINING CONSENT

{{ doc.reasons_for_decision }}
{% endif %}

RIGHT TO APPEAL

Appeals (s120 RMA): You have the right to appeal this decision to the Environment Court within 15 working days of receiving this decision.

Appeals must be lodged with the Environment Court and served on {{ rca.organization }}.

For more information on appeals, please contact us or visit the Environment Court website.

If you have any questions about this decision, please contact us quoting {{ rca.name }}.

Yours sincerely,

{% if doc.approved_by %} {{ doc.approved_by }}
{% endif %} Consent Authority

Resource Consent Decision issued under the Resource Management Act 1991
name: Decision Letter - Declined

html:
Organization Name

Resource Consents

{{ frappe.utils.formatdate(frappe.utils.nowdate(), "dd MMMM yyyy") }}

{{ doc.submitter_name }}
{% if doc.submitter_email %}{{ doc.submitter_email }}
{% endif %}

RE: Submission on Resource Consent Application {{ doc.resource_consent_application }}

Dear {{ doc.submitter_name }},

Thank you for your submission on the above resource consent application.

Submission Details:

  • Submission Number: {{ doc.name }}
  • Application: {{ doc.resource_consent_application }}
  • Your Position: {{ doc.submission_position }}
  • Wish to be Heard: {{ "Yes" if doc.wishes_to_be_heard else "No" }}

Your submission will be considered as part of the decision-making process for this application.

{% if doc.wishes_to_be_heard %}

Hearing: You have indicated that you wish to speak to your submission at a hearing. We will contact you with hearing details once they have been scheduled.

{% endif %}

What happens next?

  1. All submissions will be summarized in a section 42A report
  2. The applicant will be given an opportunity to respond to submissions
    3. {% if doc.wishes_to_be_heard %}
  3. A hearing will be scheduled and you will be notified of the date, time, and venue
    4. {% endif %}
  4. A decision will be issued considering all submissions and evidence

If you have any questions, please contact us quoting {{ doc.name }} and {{ doc.resource_consent_application }}.

Yours sincerely,

Consents Team

Resource Consents Team
name: Submission Acknowledgment Letter
